channel.title: Problem solved - mod, delete this please
channel.description:
I was just changing some weapon stats, and adding them to the PK shop I made. I compiled- No errors. But I do get this *error* when I run the server.
Loaded WorldMap In (51 ms)... Your server is now online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 16 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:168)
When I log in, it shows the game-frame, but everything else is black. :confused:
EDIT: This is a Deltascape base.

item.title: Problem solved - mod, delete this please
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

did you use the tab key rather than the space bar when you were changing the numbers in item.cfg?

Read full topic
item.source: Problem solved - mod, delete this please
